title: snowflake.snowpark.WhenMatchedClause | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
A matched clause for the Table.merge() action. It matches all
remaining rows in the target Table that satisfy join_expr
while also satisfying condition, if it is provided. You can use
functions.when_matched() to instantiate this class.

condition – An optional Column object representing the
specified condition. For example, col("a") == 1.
Defines a delete action for the matched clause and returns an updated WhenMatchedClause with the new delete action added.
Defines an update action for the matched clause and returns an updated WhenMatchedClause with the new update action added.
